definition: warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if

sentences.english: But though slightly drunk he was also suffering under some grief that was genuine and unbearable .
sentences.chinese: 不過他縱然略有醉意，卻有着什麼真切難忍的悲慟。

sentences.english: Maybe in her mind he disappeared never ever, although he had gone with the wind.
sentences.chinese: 也許在她心底，他永遠不會消失，縱然他已隨風而逝。

sentences.chinese: 梧桐碎夢，縱然再美好，也是虛的。

sentences.english: Even if / though you fail, you will have gained experience.
sentences.chinese: 縱然你失敗，你也會得到一些經驗。

sentences.english: He will never be dishonest even though hebe reduced to poverty.
sentences.chinese: 他決不會不誠實，縱然淪落到貧困境地。

sentences.english: He will come on time even though it rains.
sentences.chinese: 縱然降雨，他還是會準時來的。

sentences.english: He loves you even when you reject Him.
sentences.chinese: 縱然你拒絕這位真神，祂仍然愛你。

sentences.english: It is just a lone dark of night, I can pinpoint the direction.
sentences.chinese: 縱然是暗夜裏獨行，我也可以找準方向。

sentences.english: So I can make believe I have everything.
sentences.chinese: 縱然我可以掩耳盜鈴的以爲自己擁有了一切。

sentences.english: But as difficult as the testing may be, we can keep our faith in God.
sentences.chinese: 不過，熬煉縱然難受，我們仍然能守住對神的信心。

sentences.english: Even though we were busy, we thought it would be disrespectful not to put in an appearance.
sentences.chinese: 縱然我們很忙，我們認爲不出席是失禮的。

sentences.english: Let justice finished, though heaven fall.
sentences.chinese: 縱然天塌下來也要伸張正義。

sentences.english: Will lose will elapse surely, even if will return, also not like before had no time.
sentences.chinese: 失去的必定會逝去，縱然迴歸，也不會如以前無暇。

sentences.english: But even if there is no amount of give up, some things will change and the past.
sentences.chinese: 但是縱然有再多的不捨，有些東西也會改變和過去。

sentences.english: Even though I hdewoulsn't seen my clbummmdined for many years- I recognized him immedidinedly.
sentences.chinese: 縱然多年沒有看見我的同窗，我也立地認出了他。

sentences.english: Even numerous mountains and rivers cannot separate our friendship.
sentences.chinese: 縱然是萬水千山也隔不斷我們的情誼。
